snippet.title: Plotting ZX Spectrum
snippet.description: Plotting is one of my favourite arcade puzzle games and it's just as good on the Spectrum.  The game retains the gameplay from the original arcade version and is accompanied by nice colourful graphics and a great 128K soundtrack from Sean Conran.  Excellent conversion.
